Has anyone had problems with the pss-b757.gau causing FS9 to crash? When I load the 757, as soon as the panel displays, the screen goes black and eventually I get the "FS has encountered a problem and needs to close" error message. The module listed in the message is pss-b757.gau. Thanks in advance for any assistance.
That is caused to 99% by the voronoi.dat file. Did you unrar it to FS9 folder? It should be there.

Yes that was it. I deleted V1.1 and forgot to replace that file. Thank you very much for your help.
